        Study the blueprints, it`s time to design a new town in
        Build-a-lot 2. Use your entrepreneurial eye to spot the right
        locations for parks and shops. Pick your paint colors, upgrades,
        and landscaping to create the ultimate curb appeal for
        outstanding profits. How about a latte from the new coffee shop?
        Maybe new flower boxes for the garden center? Flip houses in this
        fancy resource management sequel. Welcome to the neighborhood in
        Build-a-lot 2!
